name: play-SVG
short_description:
THIS PROJECT MIGRATED TO GITHUB
https://github.com/cosmo-guffa/play-svg

A great thanks to SF.net for hosting up until now... it's nothing personal, this just isn't the right tool for the job ;)

Project description:
pLAySVG is a python library for the development and manipulation of SVG vector graphics through scripting.  pLAySVG makes it easy to create graphics based on geometric relationships.  It's intended for educational and artistic use.
